code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with Heart. she is having symptoms 12 x week, in spite of treatment. she is a 73 yr old white f. Patient does not smoke she reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 60 in, Weight 178 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

content2.Unmatched: Patient does not smoke she reports having no more than one drink a day

td.content: s:white F retired aged 74 yrs says she is having symptoms of Heart 1-2 times a week, in spite of treatment. she drinks alcohol occasionally she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 59 in, Weight 174 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

content2.Unmatched: occasionally she denies ever using cigarettes
